name: sapiens & the hack
description:
I acknowledge Turrbal and Yuggera people as the Traditional Custodians of the land on which this work was made. I also acknowledge the people of the lands that I have lived on who have made this work possible. I recognise the continuing connection to lands, waters, and communities of all Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people. 

I pay my respect to Elders: past, present, and emerging.

along came a virus...
